newsitem.title: HONG KONG: China Aero to spin-off telecom operation.
newsitem.headline: China Aero to spin-off telecom operation.

text.p: China Aerospace International Holdings Ltd said on Thursday it planned to spin-off its telecommunications equipment manufacturing and global positioning systems operations.
The company said in a statement that it had applied to the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong on May 5 to separately list shares of a newly formed subsidiary.

"The company is also in negotiation with potential strategic investors, who are interested in taking an equity stake in the group to be spun-off prior to the proposed listing, the intention being to allow closer technological and marketing cooperation between the group to be spun-off and the strategic investors," China Aerospace added.
Shares in China Aerospace rose HK$0.025 to close at HK$3.275 on Wednesday.
